main event: A circular white object, about the size of a half dollar, was observed moving in a zig-zag pattern across the sky in Sioux City, Iowa on July 7, 1963.
interesting points: The object moved across the sky in a zig-zag pattern during the first observation on July 2, 1963.
The object was observed visually and with binoculars.
The object moved in a straight path with zig-zag movements at intervals.
The object disappeared over the horizon.
The sighting was reported to the Sioux City Air Defense Sector.
